title: An Improved Variational Approximate Posterior for the Deep Wishart Process. (arXiv:2305.14454v1 [stat.ML])
abstract: Deep kernel processes are a recently introduced class of deep Bayesian models that have the flexibility of neural networks, but work entirely with Gram matrices. They operate by alternately sampling a Gram matrix from a distribution over positive semi-definite matrices, and applying a deterministic transformation. When the distribution is chosen to be Wishart, the model is called a deep Wishart process (DWP). This particular model is of interest because its prior is equivalent to a deep Gaussian process (DGP) prior, but at the same time it is invariant to rotational symmetries, leading to a simpler posterior distribution. Practical inference in the DWP was made possible in recent work ("A variational approximate posterior for the deep Wishart process" Ober and Aitchison 2021a) where the authors used a generalisation of the Bartlett decomposition of the Wishart distribution as the variational approximate posterior. translated_title: 改进的变分近似后验用于深度Wishart过程
translated_abstract: 深度核过程是一类最近引入的深度贝叶斯模型，具有神经网络的灵活性，但完全使用Gram矩阵。它们通过交替从正半定矩阵分布中取样Gram矩阵并应用确定性转换来操作。当分布被选择为Wishart分布时，模型被称为深度Wishart过程(DWP)。这个特定的模型很有趣，因为它的先验等价于深度高斯过程(DGP)的先验，但同时它对旋转对称性不变，导致后验分布更简单。最近的工作（“深度Wishart过程的变分后验近似”Ober and Aitchison 2021a）实现了对DWP的实际推断，其中作者使用Wishart分布的Bartlett分解的推广作为变分后验近似。然而，该论文中的预测性能不如其他对比方法。
tldr: 本文提出一种对DWP变分近似后验的改进算法，并分析了该方法在预测性能上的不足。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes an improved algorithm for the variational approximation posterior of DWP, and analyzes its shortcomings in predictive performance.
